channel.title: London Evening Standard | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/eveningstandard

item.title: Blackwall Tunnel van fire spar
item.description: Blackwall Tunnel van fire sparks traffic chaos as drivers abandon cars - LIVE

item.title: Cher Maximen, 32, remains in a
item.description: Cher Maximen, 32, remains in a critical condition after being stabbed in front of her little girl

item.title: The Standard View: The Paralym
item.description: The Standard View: The Paralympic Games are no one’s idea of an “after show”. Some 65,000 spectators are set to descend on Paris this evening to watch athletes from more than 180,000 nations.
